current_task: Deploy Re-import button and debug logging
message: Found issue: sessionStorage prevented re-import. Added Re-import button to force fresh import. Also added console logging to debug what endpoints return. Please deploy and user will test with browser console open.
feature_summary: Re-import button + debug logging for Apple Music
debugging_notes: After deploy, user should: 1) Open browser console, 2) Click Re-import button, 3) Check console for 'Apple Music:' logs showing endpoint counts and top 10 artists
